mapper.select: SELECT house_type as houseType, deal_type as dealType, house_name as houseName, house_no as houseNo, deal_time as dealTime, city_no as cityNo, locate as locate, area_no as areaNo, realuse as realUse, business_state as businessState, structure as structure, construction_area as constructionArea, pool_area as poolArea, building_date as buildingDate, new_situation as newSituation, street_side as streetSide, street_length as streetLength, depth as depth, total_floor as totalFloor, floor as floor, floor_height as floorHeight, decorate_situation as decorateSituation, land_use_right as landUseRight, land_expired_date as landExpiredDate, total_price as totalPrice, unit_price as unitPrice, hire_state as hireState, hire_price as hirePrice, Supporting_facilities as Supporting_facilities, contact_tel as contactTel, remark as remark, lng as lng, lat as lat, insert_time as insertTime, img as img, contract as contract, user_id as userId, hire_expired_date as hireExpiredDate, hire_unit_price as hireUnitPrice, transfer_fee as transferFee, deposit as deposit, property_management_fee as propertyManagementFee, office_facilities as officeFacilities, parking_facilities as parkingFacilities, pilespacing as pilespacing, crane_beam as craneBeam, span as span FROM tb_house_info where house_id=#{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_house_info ( house_type, deal_type, house_name, house_no, deal_time, city_no, locate, area_no, realuse, business_state, structure, construction_area, pool_area, building_date, new_situation, street_side, street_length, depth, total_floor, floor, floor_height, decorate_situation, land_use_right, land_expired_date, total_price, unit_price, hire_state, hire_price, Supporting_facilities, contact_tel, remark, lng, lat, insert_time, img, contract, user_id, hire_expired_date, hire_unit_price, transfer_fee, deposit, property_management_fee, office_facilities, parking_facilities, pilespacing, crane_beam, span ) VALUES ( #{houseType},#{dealType},#{houseName},#{houseNo},#{dealTime},#{cityNo},#{locate},#{areaNo},#{realUse},#{businessState},#{structure},#{constructionArea},#{poolArea},#{buildingDate}, #{newSituation},#{streetSide},#{streetLength},#{depth},#{totalFloor},#{floor},#{floorHeight},#{decorateSituation},#{landUseRight},#{landExpiredDate},#{totalPrice}, #{unitPrice},#{hireState},#{hirePrice},#{SupportingFacilities},#{contactTel},#{remark},#{lng},#{lat},now(),#{img},#{contract}, #{userId},#{hireExpiredDate},#{hireUnitPrice},#{transferFee},#{deposit},#{propertyManagementFee},#{officeFacilities}, #{parkingFacilities},#{pilespacing},#{craneBeam},#{span} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_house_info SET house_type = #{houseType}, deal_type = #{dealType}, house_name = #{houseName}, house_no = #{houseNo}, deal_time = #{dealTime}, city_no = #{cityNo}, locate = #{locate}, area_no = #{areaNo}, realuse = #{realUse}, business_state = #{businessState}, structure = #{structure}, construction_area = #{constructionArea}, pool_area = #{poolArea}, building_date = #{buildingDate}, new_situation = #{newSituation}, street_side = #{streetSide}, street_length = #{streetLength}, depth = #{depth}, total_floor = #{totalFloor}, floor = #{floor}, floor_height = #{floorHeight}, decorate_situation = #{decorateSituation}, land_use_right = #{landUseRight}, land_expired_date = #{landExpiredDate}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, hire_state = #{hireState}, hire_price = #{hirePrice}, Supporting_facilities = #{SupportingFacilities}, contact_tel = #{contactTel}, remark = #{remark}, lng = #{lng}, lat = #{lat}, insert_time = #{insertTime}, img = #{img}, contract = #{contract}, user_id = #{userId}, hire_expired_date = #{hireExpiredDate}, hire_unit_price = #{hireUnitPrice}, transfer_fee = #{transferFee}, deposit = #{deposit}, property_management_fee = #{propertyManagementFee}, office_facilities = #{officeFacilities}, parking_facilities = #{parkingFacilities}, pilespacing = #{pilespacing}, crane_beam = #{craneBeam}, span = #{span} WHERE house_id = #{houseId}
